paper_abstract: The paper deals with a parallel algorithm for calculations on multiprocessor computers and GPU accelerators. The calculations of shock waves interaction with low density bubble results are presented [1]. This algorithm combines a possibility to capture a high resolution of shock waves, the second-order accuracy for TVD schemes, and a possibility to observe a low-level diffusion of the advection scheme. (C) 2012 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Modeling of III-D problems of gas dynamics on multiprocessing computers and GPU
